Nappy changing
To change nappies, you will 
need:
• white cotton wool, for 
washing and drying - rolls 
are usually cheaper than  
balls, or plain water wipes 
if preferred although these 
will be more expensive;
• a changing mat;
• container for plain water;
• a bag to carry all the nappy-
changing equipment when 
you go out - a carrier bag 
will do but you can get 
special bags that include a 
changing mat.
